name: Jacksepticeye's Bell Man
description:
Jacksepticeye's Bell Man

This is a horror game, where you are being chased by a guy with bells for legs... There is not much more to say than this.

Trailer
Idea

The idea for this came from the jacksepticeye video found here!

Stuck? 

You need to collect all of the dream fragment balls which  are found in the following locations:

Basket Ball - Always located in your back garden by the basket ball net

Football - Always located somewhere random on the football field

Cannon Ball - Always located at a random spot on the construction site

Knitting Ball - Located on the lounger or table in the back garden of one of the bush houses

Beach Ball - Located randomly around the map
